list_definition.mean_english: không thay đổi về hình thức và tính cách
list_definition.definition: the same always or everywhere; not changing or varying

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The sky was a uniform grey.

list_definition.definition: (a set of) clothes worn by eg soldiers, children at a particular school etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The new uniforms will arrive tomorrow.
